name: Destination Primus Vita - Episode 1: Austin - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Destination Primus Vita: Episode 1 - Soundtrack created by Antoine Berthiaume.
26 tracks of music in mp3 format.

01 – Main Theme – Primus Vita
02 – Intro
03 – Intro Part Two
04 – The Awakening
05 – The Pathway
06 – The Base Entry
07 – Coby’s flat
08 – It’s The We That Matters
09 – The Locker Room
10 – Meeting Hayao
11 – Temporary Base
12 – Going up and Down
13 – Going Even More Down
14 – In The Vapor
15 – Power Room
16 – Hurry and Dance
17 – In The Vapor – Juke Box
18 – Is This a Base
19 – 10-4, Fire
20 – Abril is Leaving
21 - Her Heart Must Survive
22 – She’s Happy and Free
23 – Find your Way
24 – Ready To Go
25 – Coby is Going
26 - Menu
